articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: American Ksenia Karelina released in prisoner deal with Russia - Axios
articles.description: It's the second prisoner exchange between the U.S. and Russia since President Trump took office.
articles.content:
Russia on Thursday released Ksenia Karelina, a dual Russian-American citizen, as part of a prisoner exchange deal with the U.S., Secretary of State Marco Rubio said in a statement.
Why it matters: T… [+3588 chars]
